category.name: Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_custom_item_report_itk_library
preference.preference_description: Specifies the customer own written library used to generate custom report, in which they implement business logical with their own ITK. Library name and method name are mandatory. libname:{method:methodName,function:functioName} OR libname:{method:methodname}
